name: expect-to-assert
description: "Convert Chai.js(BDD) API based tests to Assertive(TDD) API tests for older browsers IE8"

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/ --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Vikram Kamath
